data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 2, San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in San Luis.
In the minute 4, Monterrey have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Monterrey to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Monterrey's half?
Throw-in for Monterrey at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 9, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
San Luis's Pablo Barrera misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Monterrey at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
Corner awarded to Monterrey.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to San Luis.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Maximiliano Meza for Monterrey who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Monterrey in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 20, Maximiliano Meza has recovered and rejoins the match in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 20, Goal! Monterrey have got their heads in front thanks to a Ake Arnaud Loba strike.
Jesus Gallardo instrumental with a fine assist.
The match at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez has been interrupted briefly for a check on Ake Arnaud Loba, who is down injured.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Monterrey throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 24, Monterrey to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Luis de Potosi.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 25, Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Ake Arnaud Loba for Monterrey is back on the field again.
In the minute 27, Monterrey have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Monterrey.
Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Monterrey at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal! San Luis go level at 1-1 through Mauro Quiroga in San Luis de Potosi.
In the minute 33, Juan Castro (San Luis) gets a yellow card.
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for San Luis close to the penalty box.
Monterrey's Rogelio Funes Mori has been booked in San Luis de Potosi.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
Ball safe as Monterrey is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 38, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Monterrey throw-in in San Luis's half.
San Luis have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Monterrey.
In the minute 40, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
San Luis surge into the attack at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez but Dionicio Escalanteâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 43, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Monterrey.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
San Luis have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
The first-half has come to a close in San Luis de Potosi.
Maximiliano Meza scores to make it 1-2 at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
In the minute 46, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava has blown to start the second-half.
San Luis's German Berterame breaks free at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Monterrey goal kick.
In the minute 47, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 52, Cesar Montes (Monterrey) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
San Luis needs to be cautious. Monterrey have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ventura Alvarado is booked for the home team.
Red card in San Luis de Potosi! Cesar Montes has been shown a second yellow card by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 60, In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nicolas Ibanez is on a sub for Jorge Sanchez for San Luis.
In the minute 61, German Berterame for San Luis has been booked by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava and receives a first yellow card.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 63, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Monterrey a goal kick.
The away team replace Miguel Layun with Eric Cantu.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Monterrey in the half of San Luis.
Antonio Mohamed is making the team's second substitution at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez with Daniel Alexis Parra replacing Ake Arnaud Loba.
Rodrigo Noya (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 67, Play has been interrupted briefly in San Luis de Potosi to check on Dionicio Escalante, who is grimacing with pain.
Throw-in Monterrey.
Dionicio Escalante (San Luis) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Felipe Gallegos.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Monterrey at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Monterrey in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Monterrey throw-in in San Luis's half.
San Luis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Monterrey.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 72, At Alfonso Lastras Ramirez, Nicolas Sanchez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Monterrey.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Matias Kranevitter is replacing Maximiliano Meza for the away team.
Monterrey make their fourth substitution with Vincent Janssen replacing Rogelio Funes Mori.
Throw-in for Monterrey in their own half.
In the minute 79, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
San Luis push upfield but Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick San Luis.
In the minute 81, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Monterrey a goal kick.
Monterrey awarded a free kick in their own half.
Monterrey to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Monterrey in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in San Luis de Potosi.
Arturo Gonzalez is on a sub for Carlos Rodriguez for Monterrey.
In the minute 88, Free kick in a good position for Monterrey!
Monterrey awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Monterrey get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In San Luis de Potosi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal kick for San Luis at Alfonso Lastras Ramirez.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to San Luis.
Monterrey have a goal kick.
Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
